embed: <object width="640" height="390"><param name="movie" value="http://youtube.com/v/Wlkhy8rXOjE?version=3&hl=en_US"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://youtube.com/v/Wlkhy8rXOjE?version=3&hl=en_US" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="640" height="390" allowscriptaccess="always" allowfullscreen="true"></embed></object>
summary:
This talk is a "how I did it" talk about how I took an idea, a web cam,
Python, Django, and the Python Imaging Library and created art, explored
science, and illustrated concepts that our ancestors knew by watching the sky
but we have lost.
title: Fun Observational Science with Python and a Webcam
